description: This file defines internal API function prototypes for the Sys Rro Hcxt Object in the BroadWay Runtime System Environment. It includes function declarations related to getting and setting record data and values, indicating it is part of an internal interface for managing a specific component's internal state.

methods.name: SysRroHcxtGetRecordData
methods.description: Retrieves the record data associated with the object, filling the provided data buffer and updating its size.

methods.name: SysRroHcxtSetRecordData
methods.description: Sets the record data for the object using the provided data buffer and size.

methods.name: SysRroHcxtGetRecordValue
methods.description: Provides access to the current record value associated with the object.

methods.name: SysRroHcxtSetRecordValue
methods.description: Sets the record value for the object.
